dict.acceptation: 无聊的，无趣的；令人厌烦的；单调的，乏味的；

sent.orig: Division against a very boring, very boring, I am the only one court reporter.
sent.trans: 分组对抗很枯燥、很无聊，场边只有我一个记者。

sent.orig: Life is only boring to boring people.
sent.trans: 只有对于无聊的人，生活才会无聊。

sent.orig: And as normal as life. A bit boring. But not boring.
sent.trans: 而且是像正常人那样的生活。有点乏味。但不枯燥。

sent.orig: Full face Tunnel Boring Machine (TBM) is considered as advanced equipment for boring tunnel.
sent.trans: 全断面掘进机代表了隧道掘进装备的发展方向。

sent.orig: We often forgive those that we feel are boring, but not forgive are boring us.
sent.trans: 我们常常宽恕那些感觉起来很无聊的东西，却无法宽恕那些让我们无聊的东西。
